txt.en: 'Brethilwen has always been a brilliant vintner. Her guidance has created some of the finest wines.'
'The vineyard is north-west of Celondim, at the bottom of a slope in a sheltered valley.'
'Brethilwen sometimes lets me crush the wine grapes. Being involved in the process is delightful!'
'My good friend Dolengyl at Duillond to the north is also a wine enthusiast.'
